        Returns:

      • findJogada

        public java.lang.String findJogada(int pos)
        Parameters:
        pos - Position of player on Board 0-63, function goes on to find the piece in that pos
        Returns:
        String with all possible moves of the piece in the form (Line Column PieceToMove Line Column) + 'C' + PieceToTake + 'p'

      • kingSafe

        public boolean kingSafe()
        This function takes the position of the King on Board kingPositionC, and checks if any of the pieces in play are threatning the king
        Returns:
        true if safe

      • invertAllPiecesInfo

        public void invertAllPiecesInfo()
        The logic is designed so that it's allways Uppercase pieces playing This function inverts the piece positions symetrically so that they are in the same position if the board is rotated 180d

      • flipBoard

        public void flipBoard()
        flipBoard rotates the board, and calls InvertAllPieces So that the info of the Pieces is corrected after the board rotation

      • retrievePossibleMovesList

        public java.lang.String[] retrievePossibleMovesList(java.lang.String str)
        Parameters:
        str - Receieves a string with all the possible plays from a Piece, in form play1 ; play2 ;
        Returns:
        a String array with the plays correctly formatted to be treated by logic in form (Line Column PieceToMove Line Column) + exceptions

        Parameters:

        y - Column in board
        Returns:
